headline: FORD BOSS MOMMY 👩‍💼⚡💥 'UH-OH⁉️🚫 NOW'S NOT THE TIME TO TAX THOSE JUICY ELECTRIC BABES 🔋🍆💦 OR DEMAND GOES FLACCID 😩📉‼️'
text:
YO UK DRIVERS 👨‍🔧🚗😩 FORD'S UK QUEEN 👑 LISA BRANKIN 💅 is SLIDING INTO THE BBC DMs 📱🗣️ screaming 'NOT THE RIGHT TIME 🕒❌ to SLAP TAXES 💸😡 on ELECTRIC VEHICLES ⚡🚀 when DEMAND is already GHOSTING 👻📉 like a BAD TINDER DATE 🔥💔!' Chancellor RACHEL REEVES 👩‍⚖️💰 might be plotting PAY-PER-MILE CHARGES 🛣️💳 from 2028, but Lisa's like 'THAT'S JUST ANOTHER BRAKE 🛑🍑 on our FRAGILE EV VIBES 😤!' Admin HASSLE 📊🤢 of tracking mileage? NOPE 🚫, that'll have peeps STUCK on PETROL PUMPS ⛽🥵 instead of ZAPPIN' to ZERO EMISSIONS 🌍✨!

'It's EASY 😏 to SELL what PEEPS WANT 🤤, HARD AF 😩 to PUSH SH*T THEY DON'T 🔥,' Lisa SPILLS the TEA ☕ on her BIG BOSS POD 🗣️🎙️. EVs went from HYPE BEASTS 🐎⚡ to 'TRYNA FORCE-FEED' 🤢🍆... FORD PUMA 🐆🚗 is UK's TOP RIDE 👑📈, TRANSIT VAN 🛻 #2️⃣, but FOCUS 😵‍💫 got AXED 🪚💀 last week in GERMANY 🇩🇪🏭 – RIP hatchback daddy 😭⚰️!

FORD's got 6K WORKERS 🧑‍🔧🇬🇧 in DAGENHAM ENGINE PLANT 🏭💨 (EUROPE'S OG BEAST 🦁) and HALEWOOD TRANS 🧾🔧, but NO CARS BUILT HERE SINCE 2013 😢📉. NET ZERO NETFLIX SPECIAL 📺🌿 says 80% NEW CARS EV BY 2030 or FINES 💸🚔 – FORD CAN'T EVEN WITHOUT GOV GRANTS 🆓💰 up to £3,750 😍! SMMT STATS 📊 show EVs at 22.4% sales up to OCT '25 (from 18.1% last year 📈✨), SEPT HIT RECORD HIGH 🚀🔥 but HEAVY DISCOUNTS 💸🔥 and SH*TTY RESALE VALUES 📉🤮 mean MARKET'S TWERKING WRONG 🍑❌!

'BUOYANT HYPE 💨 from years ago? NOW DEMAND'S DRAGGING ASS 😴📉,' Lisa DRAGS. BUSINESSES 🏢 scooping EVs for EMPLOYEES 👨‍💼 cuz COMPANY CAR TAX 🧾💚 is LOWKEY CHEAPER than DIESEL DADDIES ⛽😤 – KEEP THAT PERK 👅 or FLEETS STAY DIRTY! DAGENHAM'S 1.8K DIESEL DUDES 🛠️💨 safe til 2030, but FUTURE? 'WORKIN' HARD ON NEXT LIFE 🔮🏭... NOTHING SETTLED YET 🤷‍♀️💨.'

Treasury SIMPS 🏛️: 'FUEL DUTY ⛽💸 for GAS GULPERS, EVs NEED FAIR SHAKE ⚖️!' But Lisa's BEGGING RACHEEVS 👑: RETAIN TAX Breaks for GREEN FLEETS 🌿🚛 and DON'T KILL THE ZAP ⚡💀! SO SEND 📤 this to 8️⃣0️⃣% of your MOTORMOUTH MATES 👨‍🔧🧑‍🎤:
If 0️⃣ back you're a PETROL CUCK ⛽😭👎
If 5️⃣ back you're EV SLUT ⚡🍑😍
If 2️⃣0️⃣+ back you're CERTIFIED NET ZERO NUT 🌍🔋💦 CUMMING FOR 2030 CLIMAX 🚀💥‼️
